name: Mark Davis
message:
I just came on the net, thinking of this awesome movie Hercules Returns I saw almost 10 years ago for the first time, and after searching for it EVERYWHERE, it's unbelievably nowhere to be seen on DVD!! What is this world coming too???

RELEASE HERCULES RETURNS on DVD Pleeeeeaaaase!!!

Well done for writing to the Film makers! Hopefully they'll realise that it is a world favourite film!

Mark
Wellington, NZ
